summary:
NEW optional file! Skooma the drug! Will you test it?
Perfect with Winter Is Coming - Cloaks! Beacuse of with the cloak you will not see the backpack!
How could you carry so much without a backpack?
Not at all anymore! So use your backpack!
german and english
descriptionHtml:
NEW optional file! Skooma the drug! Will you test it?
Get the power by drinking Skooma because of your dragon blood! But be careful such a power weaks your body after the powerful time!

Perfect with Winter Is Coming - Cloaks! Beacuse of with the cloak you will not see the backpack!
Without your backpack you can carry only 50! With it so much you can original carry (based on stamina).
You can found a backpack at Helgen (short after beginning game) and you can buy them at vendors.

You can carry the backpack additional to an amulet and quivers! (also npcs)

Sorry, because of not having models for this backpack equipped so it is invisible. Would be great if someone would create models for this. Perfect if compatible to quivers and weapons!
(For myself I use the models of another mod.)

My other mod:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10857]Breezehome cellar no loadingscreen basement Keller[/url]

Hint:
No new scripts!
author: fruitgnome
